headline: 3M Uses AI Tools To Tighten Customer Links And Materials Choice
summary: 3M (NYSE:MMM) has introduced Ask 3M and the 3M Digital Materials Hub, two digital tools that use generative AI and advanced modeling to support customer product design. The new platforms are intended to help engineers and designers solve materials challenges and speed up development timelines through virtual collaboration and simulation. For investors watching 3M at a share price of $172.85, these launches highlight how the company is using its materials expertise in a more digital,...
